Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2018 04:49AM welldunn wrote: That is why I am here - looking for answers, too. I visited the radiation nurse and she identified the problem. Her solution was non-stick pads and watch TV in front of a fan. It is so painful, weepy, and I don't know how long to expect this will take to heal.
Posts.Title: A rad onc weighs in on radiation "burns" Spinnerpom 53nancy

Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2018 06:41PM welldunn wrote: Thank you for the replys. I am feeling better. Nice to hear how well you are doing. Cancer is certainly a lesson on patience.
